oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blessing and Dedication of the Garden Shrine of the Blessed Virgin Mary
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Shrines; Dedications; Programs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Given by the family of Dr. Richard Deutsch by his family, the Shrine to the Blessed Virgin Mary outside St. Joseph Hall was dedicated on April 3, 2007.
